EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Stuttgart
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Stuttgart. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Stuttgart Tuesday, 12th July 2016 9:00am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/stuttgart]]>
Location: Parkhotel Filderbahnstraße 2 70771 Leinfelden-Echterdingen Germany
Questions? Contact Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
